Description:
Opportunity Is Knocking In Belmont.
Set upon approx. 685m2, this property presents buyers with a myriad of options. Move straight in, renovate to create your dream family home, secure your next investment property, or even use the generous land size for development (STCA) the choice is yours.
Ideally positioned in a Belmont hotspot, this location will leave you wanting nothing. A short walk places you in the bustling hub of High Street, where youll be spoilt for choice with a wide variety of cafes, restaurants, boutiques and supermarkets. Families will be in their element with Oberon P.S, Belmont High School and Barwon Valley School all within easy walking distance. Public transport is footsteps away, while Winter Reserve is close by for sporting enthusiasts. Easy access to the Barwon River and Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre adds the final touch to this fantastic locale.
The front porch welcomes you into the home, while the interiors feature polished floorboards and timber paneling to the hallway. Northern light sweeps through the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone, which creates the cosy heart of the home. The kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry and cooking appliances (oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). Three bedrooms with built-in robes are serviced by the main bathroom, which is complete with a single vanity and combined bath/shower. The laundry and separate toilet are positioned at the rear of the home. A wall heater, split-system air conditioner and ceiling fans keep your comfortable in all seasons.
Outside, the paved alfresco puts the foundations in place for casual outdoor living relax under the shade of the tree in summer or snuggle around the fire pit during the colder months! Overflowing with potential, the generous backyard is home to a cubby house and sandpit. Parents will appreciate that they can close the front gate to create another secure play space in the front yard. The single carport and single lock-up garage provide parking, while two garden sheds offer plenty of storage.
With so much to offer, youll need to act swiftly to secure this Belmont gem.
Insights: 263 High Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Convenience & Quiet
The Feel:
Centrally located to main street shopping & cafés, with close proximity to the Barwon River, this single level two bedroom brick veneer unit offers great versatility for those looking to invest or downsize. Ideally positioned for privacy at the rear, this neatly presented, freshly painted unit also features new carpets & a generous sized kitchen with new appliances. Open plan meals & living flows directly to an easy-care north-facing outdoor entertaining area, under the shade of stunning neighbouring gums.
The Facts:
-Hidden gem close to everything you love about Barwon Heads!
-Absolute privacy thanks to ideal rear position, with easy access to main street shops
-Welcoming veranda invites you into this single level brick veneer unit
-Versatile opportunity for those looking to downsize or add to investment portfolio
-Fresh interior paintwork & carpet throughout; well-presented & move-in ready
-2 spacious bedrooms with generous full span BIRs
-Main BR outlook to covered fernery courtyard, accessed via laundry
-Central bathroom as original with shower, bath, vanity & separate WC
-Brand new kitchen, cabinetry & appliances; electric oven/cooktop/range & DW
-Light-filled open plan meals & living room w/ SSAC & ceiling fan
-Single lock up garage with rear door to backyard
-Sunny north outdoor paved area amongst low maintenance garden & lawn surrounds
-Walk everywhere; metres to main street shops, cafes, river & walking trails!
The Owner Loves.
Within a few paces I can be amongst the Barwon Heads village lifestyle, enjoying the coffee shops, community, supermarket, or riverside walks. It is a rare luxury to balance easy access to amenities, with the desire for privacy, space & quiet, yet this this rear unit offers just that... The car barely gets out of the garage; why would you drive when you can walk everywhere?

Description:
Titled & Ready To Build Your Dream Home
Situated in a premier location in the Highview Estate. This titled and ready to build 952m² block provides many building options for astute buyer. Surrounded by world class architecturally designed homes, this location is highly regarded.
Conveniently located only a short drive from the Barrabool Hills Plaza with a 24/7 gym making it ever so easy to maintain a high level of fitness and do the weekly shop, not forgetting the warm community vibe of Highton Village with excellent cafes and eateries to enjoy over the weekend. A selection of quality schools available, including Montpellier Primary and Highton Primary, plus excellent sporting reserves and recreational parks. With access to the Geelong Ring Road made ever so easy you can drive to Melbourne within 45 minutes, or cruise down to the world famous surf coast without hassle.
Insights: 18 Radstock Avenue, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Exclusive Location with Priceless Outlook
The perfect location positioned in the heart of old Highton, with picturesque views across Geelong and to the river. Upstairs, the open plan living zone makes a stylish statement with Jarrah timber floors and expansive windows which allows for lots of natural light to stream through. Sliding doors open out onto the front deck taking in the incredible outlook. The second living space / 4th bedroom has the flexibility to run a business from with its own separate entry or even a great area to read a book or just to sit down and relax overlooking the front garden. The galley style kitchen offers generous storage, with stone bench tops and walk in pantry. Offering three upstairs bedrooms, the master with views over Geelong featuring built in robes and ensuite, with the remaining two both offering built in robes (one with built in desk and serviced by the updated bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles and oversized bath.
Extras Include
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative cooling
- Remote DLUG with internal access
- Alfresco area
- Study nook
- Established gardens
- New carpet throughout
Insights: 24 Culzean Crescent, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2015 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Low-Maintenance Living Has Never Looked So Good.
Have you been dreaming of low-maintenance living but don't want to compromise on space or quality? Then this is the one for you. Whether you're a first homebuyer, downsizer, or investor, you'll need to act swiftly to secure this Leopold gem.
Positioned in a peaceful pocket, you can enjoy a quiet lifestyle while still being close to everyday essentials. Public transport and the Ash Road shops are a short stroll away, while the expansive Gateway Plaza is close by for all of your shopping and dining needs. Young families will appreciate that Leopold Kindergarten, Leopold P.S. and the Leopold Community Hub are all within walking distance. Easy access to sporting grounds and the Gateway Sanctuary inspires you to venture outdoors. Just jump in the car, and you'll soon be in the heart of Geelong or exploring the Bellarine Peninsula.
High, square set ceilings and polished floorboards grace the immaculate interiors. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone unites with the north-facing alfresco deck - creating a generous setting for both everyday living and for when loved ones come to visit. Whether you want to relax under the shade sail or soak up the sunshine, the private deck will effortlessly accommodate. The kitchen will delight cooking enthusiasts with a built-in pantry, breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas cooktop, rangehood).
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom features built-in robes and an en suite with large shower. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet. The generous study boasts a built-in desk and storage perfect for students and home business owners alike! The laundry is complete with storage and external access.
You'll be comfortable all year long thanks to ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner and ceiling fans. Updates over the last two years include freshly painted interiors, new carpet, new remote garage door, new hot water service and a new oven and gas cooktop. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while a 2100L rainwater tank adds the final touch to this low-maintenance gem.
Insights: 2/21 The Court, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2014 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Family home with great potential.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Set in an elevated position, on a generous 709m2 block, this beautiful family home is sure to impress those searching for space, convenience and privacy.
Offering 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and plentiful indoor and outdoor living space, as well as an expansive backyard, this property is ideal for the growing family.
On entry, the large living area welcomes you and flows through to the open plan kitchen, and dining area. The kitchen/dining room blends seamlessly with the decked alfresco, which offers views over Corio Bay and is ideal for year-round entertainment with the whole family.
The kitchen with step-in-pantry & stainless-steel appliances offers plentiful cupboard space. The main bedroom offers an ensuite and a walk in robe with built in cabinetry. Bedrooms 2 and 3 both offer built in robes and the 4th bedroom could be ideal for a home study if desired.
Notable features include:
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms
- Oversized single garage/workshop in backyard
- Gas heater and wall A/C in the kitchen/dining room
- Split system A/C in the living room
Located in a well-established area surrounded by quiet tree-lined streets, parks, gardens, recreation reserve, bike tracks and running trails. Conveniently located close to public transport, local schools, and is just a short drive to Leopold's Gateway Shopping Centre. Call to arrange your private inspection!
Insights: 33 Darrambal Crescent, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern & spacious with loads of appeal
Youll love:
This as-new contemporary home offers a clever layout with stylish open plan living, high ceilings & loads of other quality features throughout.
The gorgeous kitchen, with its Smeg 900mm gas stove & oven, pendant lighting, timber cabinetry, huge stone island bench & Butlers pantry is everything you could ever possibly want!
A stunning, king sized master bedroom suite, featuring a luxurious alcove with ensuite & a large dressing room.
The stacker doors that open the main living area up to the undercover alfresco deck & sunny yard at the rear make this a dream home for entertaining friends & family.
Plus:
Theres also a large second bedroom with BIRs & ensuite, 2 more bedrooms with BIRs, a 2nd living area, plus a central bathroom.
Fabulous storage options including a walk-in room in the hallway, floating cabinetry in the 2nd living area, a lock-up garden shed & the double garage.
Other features include the alarm system & central heating throughout, additional split-system units in the master bedroom & main living, ducted vacuum system plus a fully landscaped & low maintenance allotment.
Located on a quiet court in a friendly neighbourhood, that's close walking distance to primary schools, shops & cafes.
Insights: 10 Everlasting Court, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning family home in a court location.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
On offer here in the exclusive Grange Park Estate, is this magnificent property which offers 2,790m2 of private residential land.
From the moment you drive up the semi-circular, tree-lined driveway and park in front of this imposing, landmark property, you know you are in a special place. The grand, homestead-style, two-storey house surrounded by impressive landscaping is accompanied, by a fully self-contained, classy bungalow, triple-car garage previously used as a hair studio and a massive 10x9m shed to the rear of the property perfect for the boat, caravan or motorhome.
This property surprises at every turn. The house has been refreshed and updated from top to bottom and presents as a perfect example of modern living. Downstairs offers three big bedrooms, family bathroom, spacious laundry, formal lounge room, theatre room with included surround sound, projector and seating, and an open-plan kitchen and dining. The kitchen has a great salute to yesteryear - an in-built, fully functional IXL No.5 slow-combustion stove and oven - alongside modern appliances. Just imagine the homestead-style warmth and the smell of freshly baked bread wafting throughout the house in the middle of winter. Five bi-fold glass doors open from the kitchen/dining area to a north-facing undercover deck, where fine dining and entertaining is a breeze. Alongside is another undercover area, featuring a six-person spa, built-in bar and barbecue space.
Upstairs is the main bedroom, with ensuite, and a wonderful parents' retreat/rumpus and adjoining study. A large balcony offers commanding views to the north over the backyard. Throughout the house, the quality of the build is obvious; Victorian Ash hardwood flooring alongside lush carpets, contemporary tiles ornate touches. Towards the rear of the property stands the self-contained bungalow, featuring an open plan kitchen/dining/living, a separate bedroom with built in robe and bathroom with separate toilet. The possibilities here are many; it could be a guest house, teenager's retreat, permanent accommodation for elderly relatives or even the perfect pool house for those with intentions of installing a pool in the expansive yard.
The free-standing garage - the design and build complementing the main house - has been adapted to cater for two vehicles alongside a hair salon with plumbing ready to go; return the space to cater for three vehicles or kit out the salon for whatever purpose you like. Of course, a swim at the famous Surf Coast beaches is only 15 minutes or so down the road.
The Waurn Ponds railway station is nearby, and major shopping centres are close at hand. This property, beautifully landscaped and a great example of an owner-built project, offers a rare chance to live a secluded, modern lifestyle with loads of space around you and all the advantages of being close to big-city facilities.
It has to be inspected to be appreciated.
To book your private inspection please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.

Description:
Blue Chip Location!
The Feel:
This extremely rare offering to the market will quickly find new owners, who will enjoy balmy summers & extended weekends with family & friends for years to come. Tucked away behind the dunes of the Barwon Heads Golf Club, & a short stroll to the river & village centre, this is one of Barwon Heads' best kept secret locations.
The Facts:
-Set at the southern end of exclusive Hitchcock Ave
-No through traffic & direct local access to Ewing Blyth Rd, river & beach
-Listen to the sounds of the sea & crashing surf at nearby 13th Beach
-Single level home set on approx. 440m full of light and open space
-Open plan kitchen & living area with split system heating & cooling
-Kitchen of its era, with wall oven oven, ample storage and countertop breakfast bar
-Living room features in built cabinetry and substantial space for a dinning table
-Wall of windows captures beautiful private north garden outlooks
-Doors from the open plan living open up onto a wrap-around verandah
-Master bedroom with en-suite boasts doors opening up onto garden space
-2 further bedrooms with built in robes are well appointed off leading hallway
-Family bathroom is well appointed to minor bedrooms
-Outdoor gardens are private, established and enjoy a full northerly aspect
-Double lock up garage with rear door access
-Incredibly rare chance to claim a golden opportunity in tightly-held Hitchcock Ave locale
The Owner Loves.
This home has been held in our family for many years and we have enjoyed many cherished times here. It has been a fabulous location, close to the Barwon Heads Golf Course and short stroll to the village shopping.

Description:
Central Torquay Townhouse With Elevator
This is clever, contemporary and a little metropolitan right in the heart of Torquay. Visual appeal, quality and the latest in smart home technology all combine to deliver an experience of extreme liveability.
Offered over two levels with the added bonus of a lift between floors, upstairs is for light filled living. The expansive kitchen makes for effortless entertainment and it blends super functionality with sleek good looks. It includes induction cooking; stainless bench tops and appliances; a large pantry; bar fridge and timber topped central island breakfast bar. A sunny deck provides outdoor living and a slice of the ocean can be spotted from here and the relaxed living zone. A study area and powder room with ample storage completes the layout on this level.
Downstairs features a king sized and inviting master suite with walk in robe and double shower in the en-suite. A second bedroom enjoys a sunny position and is conveniently located adjacent to the family bathroom. A full size laundry plus additional under stair storage are also included. Secure off street parking is accessed via a rear laneway with a double carport provided.
Additional highlights include stunning hardwood floors, Mount Agnes sandstone feature wall, 2.5kw solar, double glazing and hydronic heating. The home utilises leading edge technology to automate and remote control security, entry, lighting, window blinds, heating, music and high windows.
All of this is located within a short walk to shops, dining, parks and the choice of word class beaches. This outstanding home offers the chance to embrace chic urban living right here on the Surf Coast.
Insights: 10 other 2 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
TITLED LAND NOW SELLING
The Dunes, Torquay has been designed to complement both the landscape and the laid back coastal lifestyle - while giving you state-of-the-art facilities and beautiful
scenery to build your new home.
Centrally located to let you make the most of Torquay's attractions The Dunes gives you quick and easy access to the beach and the Sands Golf Club, new shopping centres, schools, sporting facilities and just around the point leads you straight to Torquay's main beach.
Once you arrive home to The Dunes, the atmosphere, clean ocean air and open space will make it seem as if you are in a world of your own.

Description:
A showpiece home with a touch of Scandinavian flair
A sense of class and superior quality is immediately apparent when you walk into this magnificent home. Designed with absolute precision, this home is functional, stylish and boasts the latest state of the art features. An array of perfectly positioned double glazed windows allow the home to be illuminated by natural light, both thermally efficient and creating a beautiful ambience. The ultimate entertainer with plenty of room for guests, enormous Scandinavian influenced kitchen with view of the generous backyard, two stunning entertaining areas plus river views, this home is something else.
Features include:
- Argon gas filled double glazed windows and doors
- Custom double entrance doors
- Stunning polished concrete flooring
- Slab floor heating with split/systems throughout
- Five Bedrooms, three bathrooms, two living areas
- Two Master bedrooms with their own ensuites
- Four bedrooms have walk-in robes
- Rare 4 car garaging 7x11m
- Kitchen: Stone benchtops, European appliances
- Kitchen: Enormous wrap around butlers pantry
- Stunning second story entertaining balcony, north-facing
- Downstairs alfresco area accessible from kitchen/living
- Barwon River and Valley Views
- Close to Barrabool Hills Shopping, Highton Village
- Close to Ring Road, public transport for commuters
- A few minutes drive to Geelong's best colleges
Insights: 185 Grantham Drive, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 5 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Owner Says Sell! If you have the site, this is perfect!
The owner of this immaculate 4-year-old relocatable cabin has given me clear instruction to SELL!
The asking price is well below replacement cost.
The cabin must be relocated from its current site to your preferred location.
This is an opportunity not to be missed if you are looking for a "lock up and leave" option, granny flat in your backyard (STCA) even a holiday house on a bush block the options are endless!!
The cabin has been tastefully completed with superior fittings throughout, beautiful timber flooring, loads of storage, ceiling fans in both BRS, stylish plantation shutters, reverse cycle A/C in the living space complete with sliding doors opening onto a private undercover deck.
The owner is very motivated and will consider all reasonable offers.

· Private sun-filled corner block that is conveniently located close to the shopping district, schools and walking trails

Outstanding Value and Opportunity
A generous and extremely desirable 770m2 allotment is on offer in the popular Wombah Park Estate on the beach side of Fischer Street. The solid 3 bedroom home provides opportunity for an instant rental income. Developers do not miss this one, an opportunity for a two lot subdivision (STCA).
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- 20m frontage 38m depth (approx)
- Flat land
- Three bedroom solid home
- Master with ensuite
- Built in robes in all bedrooms
- Open plan kitchen, lounge and dining
- Double lock up garage with rear roller door
- Undercover pergola/carport
- Tenants on month by month
- Walk to beach in 10 mins
- Close proximity to Dunes shopping village
Inspection by appointment only and flexible settlement terms.

Description:
WELL ROUNDED FAMILY HOME!!
With the potential to add a second storey, this immaculately presented, 3-bedroom, single storey home is tasteful in design and contemporary in appearance. Providing a spacious layout the residence comprises an open plan living, dining and kitchen zone, dedicated theatre room complete with in built speakers, 3 well-sized bedrooms, 2 bedrooms inclusive of built in robes are situated close to the family bathroom, while the master is complete with a walk in robe and en-suite.
The home is equipped with many features including ducted heating, evaporative cooling, stone benchtops and 900mm cooktop to the kitchen, intimate outdoor alfresco with fire pit area, security system and double lock up garage with internal access, sited on a 480m2 (approx.) allotment and bordered by newly landscaped gardens and fruit trees.
This well-rounded family home is only moments from local beaches, parks, schools, transport links and shopping precincts, perfectly suited to young families, downsizers, first home buyers and investors alike. A must see for price conscious buyers, be quick to book your private viewing now!!
Insights: 5 Shorebreak Street, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
North facing with 270 degree views
A firm $850,000 - Step inside this family home to light and bright living spaces, surrounded by views thru natures window onto a reserve and over a golf course. One of only a handful of homes with a north facing aspect offset by only one neighbour.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- 270 degree reserve and golf views
- Only one neighbour
- Harwood timber floors
- Vaulted ceilings
- Light filled with a great sense of space
- Large living areas upstairs and downstairs
- Double sided gas log fire in the main living room
- Gas ducted heating and split system
- Large West facing deck great for entertaining
- Second private north facing deck
- Fully fenced yard
- Close proximity to schools and sports precinct
- Close proximity to The Dunes Shopping Village
- Plans available to convert carport to garage
This is the perfect place to slow down in style and enjoy the good life on the Surfcoast, with access to the estate tennis court and the Peppers Links Resort gymnasium.

Description:
Exceptional family home in the heart of Torquay
Here is a great opportunity to secure an exceptional family home in a fantastic location with only a 5 minute drive to the town centre and a short walk away from Torquays stunning beaches and Esplanade.
A modern two-level townhouse featuring 4 bedrooms, including master with walk-in-robe and ensuite, built-in-robes, additional storage in the living area and secure parking.
Multiple living zones ensure there is enough space to enjoy time with family and friends without compromise.
The open plan kitchen with light-filled living and dining overlooking the generous balcony are one of this properties best features.
The home boasts two north facing outdoor entertainment areas. One of them being an undercover alfresco dining space, as well as a beautiful, large balcony upstairs which is partly sheltered for extra privacy. Both accessible through sliding glass doors, making indoor and outdoor flow seamlessly.
Secure double-lock garage including extra roller door with access to spacious, fully fenced backyard allows little ones and pets to freely play outdoors.
This property is perfect for everyone looking for an ideally located forever home in the heart of Torquay or as a holiday house for the entire family.
Insights: 2/1C Boscarne Avenue, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Elevated, low maintenance and private
Youll love:
The privacy and elevated position provided by this low-maintenance double-storey home, conveniently located in popular Wombah Park.
The large downstairs kitchen/dining/living space, with adjoining north-facing courtyard providing natural sunlight and a lush green outlook.
A well-considered floorplan - perfect for those wanting ground-level living plus the master bedroom and ensuite also downstairs.
Plus:
Two further bedrooms with built-in robes, a study area and bathroom located on the upper level.
Other features include a double lock-up garage plus further off-street parking, air-conditioning, 2020L water tank to service the garden and all in close proximity to the shops, nature-filled Deep Creek, schools and public transport.
The master suite downstairs has extra large doors for easy wheelchair mobility and an accessible shower, along with a generous size walk in robe.
Insights: 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.
